project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a provided CSV file and computes basic statistical analysis (mean, median, and mode) for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to calculate mean for selected numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for selected numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for selected numerical columns
Write tests for the mean, median, and mode calculations
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
